definition: To soak up or take in a liquid, energy, or information.
examples: A sponge can absorb water easily.
Dark colours absorb more heat from sunlight.

extra.memory_tip: Absorb = drink in like a sponge.

definition: A heavy object that keeps a boat in place; to fix firmly in position.
examples: The ship dropped its anchor. (noun)
Posts anchor the fence to the ground. (verb)

extra.memory_tip: Anchor = heavy hook or act of holding still.

definition: A tool with bristles for cleaning or painting; to touch lightly or clean with a brush.
examples: Use a soft brush on the canvas. (noun)
Brush your hair every morning. (verb)

extra.memory_tip: Brush = bristly tool or gentle sweep.

definition: A small swelling on a plant that will grow into a leaf or flower; to begin to grow buds.
examples: The rose has a new bud. (noun)
Trees bud in early spring. (verb)

extra.memory_tip: Bud = baby part of a plant.

definition: The middle point of something; to place in the middle.
examples: Draw a dot in the centre of the circle. (noun – UK spelling ‘centre’)
Please centre the text on the page. (verb)

definition: The central part of a fruit or object; to remove the hard centre of a fruit.
examples: An apple’s core contains the seeds. (noun)
Core the pears before cooking. (verb)

extra.memory_tip: Core = middle bit or action of taking it out.

definition: A large building where goods are made by machines and workers.
examples: The biscuit factory smells sweet.
Robots help on the factory floor.

definition: A home for bees; ‘hives’ is the plural form.
examples: The beekeeper opened the hive.
Several hives stood in the orchard.

definition: A young tree, especially one with a slender trunk.
examples: They planted oak saplings in the park.
A sapling bends easily in the wind.

definition: The thick main stem of a tree; the long nose of an elephant; a large box for storing things.
examples: The tree trunk was very wide.
An elephant sprayed water with its trunk.
She stored blankets in a wooden trunk.

extra.memory_tip: Trunk = tree body, elephant nose, or big box.
